Review Name: Super! Review Description: Himalaya cooling effect cools very quickly within 5min I noticed. While himalaya cooling I checked the power consumption was really great 765W. Indoor unit works super silent. Temp range 16C TO 30C. Only concern is the quality of plastic material improvement required.
